text: Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Tomorrow's Class is in person: RLHF, Multi-modality & Guest Lecture on Voice AI Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Tomorrow's Class is in person: RLHF, Multi-modality & Guest Lecture on Voice AI Posted Thursday, November 20, 2025 8:30 PM EST Hi Everyone, Just a reminder that tomorrow’s class will be in person. We will begin by wrapping up our discussion on RLHF , and then move on to Voice AI agents . I am also pleased to announce that we will be joined by a guest speaker, Dr. Bo Wen from IBM Research . Dr. Wen has developed Voice AI agents specifically for the healthcare domain, and he will be giving us a practical introduction to use cases for voice chatbots in industry. There might be  live demo! See you there! Best, Chen Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 Go to Announcements >> You are receiving this message because you subscribed to receive instant notifications via email. Change Notification Settings
